Sentencas: The interface microstructure of the state-of-the-art cathode material for solid oxide fuel cells, SrxLa1-xMnO3 (SLM), was investigated with respect to its electrochemical performance.
Titulo: Electrode properties of Sr-doped LaMnO3 on yttria-stabilized zirconia .1. Three-phase boundary area

Sentencas: The interface microstructure was characterized by grain size and coverage of SLM on the electrolyte surface.
Titulo: Electrode properties of Sr-doped LaMnO3 on yttria-stabilized zirconia .1. Three-phase boundary area

Sentencas: Variation of the grain size was obtained by using three different sintering temperatures, whereas variation of the coverage was obtained by using two powders with a different morphology.
Titulo: Electrode properties of Sr-doped LaMnO3 on yttria-stabilized zirconia .1. Three-phase boundary area

Sentencas: This resulted in a set of six cathode/electrolyte samples with different combinations of grain size and SLM coverage at the interface.
Titulo: Electrode properties of Sr-doped LaMnO3 on yttria-stabilized zirconia .1. Three-phase boundary area

Sentencas: The cathode overpotential, as a measure for the electrochemical performance, could not be related to the length of the three-phase boundary.
Titulo: Electrode properties of Sr-doped LaMnO3 on yttria-stabilized zirconia .1. Three-phase boundary area

Sentencas: Based on the constriction resistance occurring in the electrolyte a model was developed which provides an estimate for the width of the active three-phase boundary zone.
Titulo: Electrode properties of Sr-doped LaMnO3 on yttria-stabilized zirconia .1. Three-phase boundary area

Sentencas: This zone is most likely to extend outside the cathode particle across the zirconia surface.
Titulo: Electrode properties of Sr-doped LaMnO3 on yttria-stabilized zirconia .1. Three-phase boundary area

Sentencas: The width calculated in this way was found to vary in the range of 0.03 to 0.07 mu m for the different electrode microstructures.
Titulo: Electrode properties of Sr-doped LaMnO3 on yttria-stabilized zirconia .1. Three-phase boundary area

Sentencas: It is argued that the actual values may be smaller by one or two orders of magnitude.
Titulo: Electrode properties of Sr-doped LaMnO3 on yttria-stabilized zirconia .1. Three-phase boundary area
